page.title: 04New People in Knowle
page.content: A 100 years ago people were born and lived in the same area. Today the new housing in the W. part of the area has led to an increase in the population. Some of these people have moved locally whilst others have come from different parts of the country or even a different land. A survey was carried out in one class at Bentley Heath School to see where the children were born. Of 22 children, 10 were born in Soilhull, 6 in Birmingham, 1 in Nottingham, 1 in Chelmsford, 1 in Reading, 1 in Warwick, 1 in Leicester and 1 in Bridgewater. Some children in the school were born in Sweden, Zambia, S. Africa, America and Pakistan.
